channel.title: Dont know were to change client ip
channel.description:
im using the hybrid pvp client and i need to know how to change the ip i looked in the client.java and gui.java and i cant find a thing
can someone please pleease help me!!!

item.title: Dont know were to change client ip
item.dc:creator: @Dj_Nm.E Dj Nm.E
item.description:
@Dj_Nm.E wrote:

it should be in one of those places. try searching some of this:
no-ip, 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1
or just :
server =
